articles.author: Arthur Kroeber
articles.title: China is well positioned to weather Trump’s trade war - Financial Times
articles.description: Five years of export controls have helped it get very good at making things without American technology

articles.title: Big Tech cozied up to Trump — it’s not getting much in return - The Verge
articles.description: President Donald Trump’s tariff war with China and the European Union has put American tech giants in an uncomfortable position.
articles.content:
